attributes.action: make it law for companies to pay maternity pay and leave for surrogate parents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a friend of someone who is having a child through a surrogate she is having problems with the company she works for paying her maternity leave even for after she has received her child, we want the government to make it law that all companies will pay maternity leave as they do for adoption leave to parents who become surrogate parents, the end of the day they are being discriminated against because of how they recieved the child.
